# System constants

ProgramName = ${app_name}
ProgramVersion = ${app_version}
BuildDate = ${build_date}
IsPortable = ${is_portable}

# Path to a folder where all application data will be stored. Leave this to
# "${default}" to let DocFetcher figure out a suitable place.
# If you use a relative path here, it will be resolved against the current
# working directory, which usually is the DocFetcher folder.
AppDataDir=${default}
